page.title: 13Art and Cinemas, Llandudno.
page.content: { {Oriel Mostyn,}a major art gallery run by an independent trust, is situated on Vaughan Street. It is now in dire financial trouble and has applied to the Gwynedd County Council Finance Committee for an interest-free loan. The gallery, which opened in 1979, organised a major exhibition in 1984 - {The Turner in Wales Exhibition.}Around 140 works by the major artist J.M.W. Turner (1775-1851) were brought togeth -er from important collections through -out Britain and the exhibition brought art lovers from a wide area to the town. Surprisingly, admission to the exhibition was free. There are three{Cinemas}in the town, the Astra and the Palladium on Glodd- aeth Street, and the Savoy on Mostyn Street.
